venue.name: Spiegel Auditorium @ the Cambridge Center for Adult Education

item.description:
Lost Marbles will perform their wacky blend of short form improv games, so come on down, your the next contestant on the price for improv is right!

Tickets are $5 at the door.

Doors open at 7:15, performance starts at 7:30!!!!!

Any other questions, shoot us an email or just ask us to our face yo.

lostmarblesimprov@gmail.com
item.how_to_find_us: Find me! find me! By not looking at the back of the room and at the stage, you will find Barbara, Ben, Sandy, and I on stage with the rest of the Lost Marbles.
item.why:
Come out and support Barbara, Ben, Sandy, and Jason who help make the Incubator possible.
If you think we are zainy enough every thursday, just wait til you see on an actually stage.
We'll do our best to make you giggle and it's cheap!!!
item.name: In Search of Sanity! - A Lost Marbles Performance!
